title: Spirits of the Plains: Book one of the Spirits Saga
description: Wing, the second son of Chief Windsong, leads a normal life within the Eagle tribe. Unbeknownst to him, his family has been hiding a secret from the rest of the tribe, a secret his father hoped would never touch any of his sons. Yet, the spirit residing within Wing has awoken and draws him down a new path, a path that that no one has experienced before. With another tribe planning expansion and people within the Eagle tribe maneuvering for power, Wing must come to grips with his new found abilities or see the world he knew crumble before him.
author: Daniel Glen Matuzas
